channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Maximo for Civil Infrastructure
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Maximo for Civil Infrastructure

item.title: CVE-2021-20444|2024-09-16T17:23:34.930Z -- ibm -- maximo%20for%20civil%20infrastructure
item.description: IBM Maximo for Civil Infrastructure 7.6.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 196620.
